title: 261: That’s Showbiz, Broads!
itunes:title: 261: That’s Showbiz, Broads!
description:
The Broads did a music episode so now it’s time for a tangential MOVIE and MUSICAL episode! Bekah and Jess sing some of their favorite musicals, chat about weird musicals, discuss the guy Jess fell for because of a musical, favorite childhood movies, scary as shit kid’s movies, actors they think are overrated, Bekah’s strange dream that will become a movie starring Jude Law, guilty pleasures, rom-com hot takes, old vs new versions of movies, and a lot more! 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:***FAB FIT FUN: use coupon code CHATTY21 for $10 off your first box at WWW.FABFITFUN.COM***OMAX OSHOT: go to OSHOTCBD.COM and enter code CHATTY to get 20% off O-shot sitewide!***JUNESHINE: Receive 20% off PLUS free shipping site-wide at juneshine.com/chatty***BILLIE: go to mybillie.com/chatty ***GREEN CHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/90CHATTY and use code 90CHATTY to get $90 off including free shipping!
FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
